page.title: 05LEISURE IN BURSCOUGH 1
page.content: Families are involved in 27activities including:martial arts,racquet games and team games.Uniformed organisations (Cubs,Brownies,Scouts and Guides),Night school.Other hobbies are cooking, gardening and an interest in nature, as Martin Mere Wildfowl Trust is near. People also enjoy horse riding, organ tuition and "resting on the settee". St.Johns C E SChool P.F.T.A. also present an Annual Panto. There are 4 main Leisure Centres : 1) The Sports Centre,opened in 1975,now has 8 badminton and 3 squash courts,a large sport's hall weight room,solarium and activity room for a play-group. There are also 2 soccer pitches and a BMX track.Activities include:indoor bowling,roller skating,archery,kung-fu, keep fit,climbing and gymnastics.Each week 1200 people use the Centre.
